title: Grudge - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Horror   Martial Arts   Romance
author: 山大人呀
description:
Lu has obtained a mysterious sign-in system!

Go to [own toilet] to sign in, reward one thousand yuan!

Go to [Rooftop Upstairs] to sign in and reward super powerful exercises!

Lots of sign-ins and lots of rewards!

Just when Chen Lu thought that he was about to become rich and handsome, marry a Ms. Perfect, and embark on the pinnacle of life, the challenge has just begun…

Why did this happen to me?>
